title: Protection we can trust
content: Tampax- they make a great product, especially the Tampax Pearl. Easy to use, insert and remove, absorbant and non-leaking...BUT they make things even better by having a multiple absorbancy pack with 3 different absorbancys - for use on your light days to your heaviest days (or nights). This is better for you! and who wants to use a super absorbant tampon on super light days? Not me! It is also great to have everything in one box-no need to buy three different boxes.
